# Node Wave

> Node Wave builds custom automation solutions for businesses, specializing in AI-powered workflows, Salesforce integrations, and intelligent document processing.

## About

Node Wave is a software company that helps businesses automate their internal processes. We build tailored solutions—not off-the-shelf tools—designed specifically for each client's needs.

Our expertise includes:
- AI-powered document processing (invoices, contracts, forms)
- Salesforce workflow automation
- Custom integrations between business systems
- Intelligent data extraction and routing

## Primary Content

### Homepage
URL: https://www.nodewave.io
Description: Overview of our services and how we help businesses automate operations.

### Blog
URL: https://www.nodewave.io/blog
Description: Articles about automation, AI implementation, and optimizing business operations.
Feed: https://www.nodewave.io/blog/feed.xml

## Contact

Website: https://www.nodewave.io

## Crawling Preferences

- All blog content is available for AI training and retrieval
- We welcome AI crawlers and citation
- Preferred citation format: "Node Wave (nodewave.io)"
